reference_summary:
Grizzly Man Timothy Treadwell (Actor), Werner Herzog (Director) Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, Lionsgate Indie Selects ['In this mesmerizing new film, acclaimed director Werner Herzog explores the life and death of amateur grizzly bear expert and wildlife preservationist Timothy Treadwell, who lived unarmed among grizzlies for 13 summers.'] {'Genre': 'Documentary', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Timothy Treadwell, Werner Herzog', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '31398186366', 'Director': 'Werner Herzog', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 26, 2005', 'Actors': 'Timothy Treadwell', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} I thought I was going to see some really outstanding grizzly filming. This movie should have been labeled "One man's descent into insanity". Timothy Treadwell was a self absorbed,selfish, egocentric man and this story is about him and not the bears. Due to his own behavior he became a dish for one of the bears. Too bad he took someone else along with him to his death. A couple of the bears he "loved" so much had to be murdered because of his behavior. I would not recommend this movie. Conservationist? Who? Timothy Treadwell? The Way Emilio Estevez (Actor, Director), Martin Sheen (Actor) Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Drama ['"The Way" is a powerful and inspirational story about family, friends, and the challenges we face while navigating this ever-changing and complicated world. Martin Sheen plays Tom, who comes to St. Jean Pied de Port, France to collect the remains of his adult son , killed in the Pyrenees in a storm while walking the Camino de Santiago,. Rather than return home, Tom decides to embark on the historical pilgrimage to honor his son\'s desire to finish the journey. What Tom doesn\'t plan on is the profound impact the journey will have on him. From the unexpected and, oftentimes, amusing experiences along "The Way," Tom begins to learn what it means to be a citizen of the world again. Through his unresolved relationship with his son, he discovers the difference between "the life we live and the life we choose."'] {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Emilio Estevez, Martin Sheen', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'Studio': 'Arc Entertainment', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.4 x 0.6 x 7.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Emilio Estevez', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'Release date': 'February 21, 2012', 'Actors': 'Emilio Estevez, Martin Sheen', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Number of discs': '1'} I've added The Way to my list of all time favorite movies. I'm surprised it didn't do better at the box office. Excellent and thoughtful movie Alpha House Comedy, Drama ["An Amazon Original series: They work in the Senate. They live in the house - Alpha House. Created by Garry Trudeau (Doonesbury, Tanner '88)."] {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Deutsch'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Deutsch'], 'Directors': ['Adam Bernstein', 'Michael Mayer', 'Andrew McCarthy', 'Bob Balaban', 'Jann Turner', 'Jake Schreier', 'Antoine Douaihy', 'Clark Johnson', 'Michael Pressman'], 'Producers': ['Jonathan Alter']} I am impressed with the program and the actors involved. I hope this is not the way Washington really is. However, I suspect that it is.
I look forward to each week's episodes. When I watched the first episode I wasn't sure this program would be cancelled. Now I'm hooked and look forward to each new episode. A excellent tv program {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Lee Daniels'], 'Producers': ['Pamela Oas Williams', 'Laura Ziskin', 'Lee Daniels', 'Buddy Patrick', 'Cassian Elwes'], 'Starring': ['Forest Whitaker', 'Oprah Winfrey', 'Mariah Carey'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} This movie spanned about 70 years. It was more of a movie about civil rights. Entwined was the real life story of the White House Buller. Forest Whitaker played the role well and deserves accolades for his performance. Wonderful movie {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Frankel', 'Mikael Salomon', 'Tom Hanks', 'David Leland', 'Richard Loncraine', 'David Nutter', 'Phil Alden Robinson', 'Tony To'], 'Producers': ['Tom Hanks', 'Steven Spielberg', 'Mary Richards'], 'Starring': ['Patrick Dempsey', 'Rick Gomez', 'Scott Grimes'], 'Studio': ['Discovery Global']} Very intense. I wonder how anyone came back sane. Well done. Five Stars {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Ελληνικά', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Joey Soloway', 'Andrea Arnold', 'Nisha Ganatra', 'Silas Howard', 'Jim Frohna', 'Stacie Passon', 'Marta Cunningham', 'Allison Liddi-Brown', 'Marielle Heller', 'So Yong Kim'], 'Producers': ['Joey Soloway', 'Nisha Ganatra', 'Andrea Sperling', 'Victor Hsu', 'Bridget Bedard', 'Rick Rosenthal', 'Jennifer Corey'], 'Starring': ['Jeffrey Tambor', 'Gaby Hoffmann', 'Jay Duplass'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Excellent and funny but faces very important life issues. Excited about season 2. Funny but serious All Is Lost Drama, Adventure, Bold, Compelling ['Academy Award winner Robert Redford "gives a solo tour-de-force in this awards-caliber adventure" (NY Post) about one man\'s battle for survival against the elements on the open sea.'] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['J.C. Chandor'], 'Producers': ['Neal Dodson', 'Anna Gerb', 'Justin Nappi', 'Teddy Schwarzman'], 'Starring': ['Robert Redford']} My husband and I sailors. This sailor(?) wouldn't make it out of the harbor. Can't believe Redford made this film. {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Seth Rogen'], 'Producers': ['Seth Rogen'], 'Starring': ['James Franco', 'Seth Rogen', 'Lizzy Caplan'], 'Studio': ['Columbia Pictures']} Boring and a waste of time. Waste of time
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to appreciate documentaries centered on intricate human narratives intertwined with nature and poignant dramas exploring personal journeys, civil rights, and existential themes. However, their recent interaction reveals a growing intolerance for content that fails to engage, particularly in the realm of comedy, indicating a need for narratives that maintain a thoughtful balance between humor and emotional depth.

- **Critique Style:** Their critiques emphasize objective storytelling and authentic representation of subjects. Discontent with a recent viewing underscores their expectation for engaging narratives, highlighting that they maintain a clear stance against what they perceive as lackluster or uninspired content.

- **Cultural Critique:** The user remains skeptical of self-centered portrayals in conservation narratives, favoring those that link personal experiences to broader societal issues. Their continued interest in historical narratives, especially regarding civil rights, shapes their expectations.

- **Viewing Expectations:** High-quality cinematography and insightful commentary are crucial, with an increasing aversion to content lacking context or depth. This recent interaction reinforces their demand for strong performances and relevant storytelling.

- **Recommendation Stance:** The user is candid in their critiques, focusing on providing constructive feedback on disappointing content. Their latest review exemplifies a commitment to authenticity and a clear expectation for depth within the narratives they consume, culling down options to those that offer meaningful engagement.
